actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement logic to persist API latency and error metrics in a rolling window to Redis for durability and multi-instance aggregation. This will improve observability and reliability of performance data across deployments.
implementation_steps: Add Redis connection logic (if not present) in src/config/redis.js.
Update scripts/bench/api-latency.js to write rolling window metrics to Redis after each run.
Modify src/utils/metrics.js to read/write rolling window data from Redis.
Test by running local and multi-instance setups to verify aggregation and durability.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and commit a migration plan for converting high-change backend modules (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) to TypeScript, including a prioritized file list and migration checklist.
implementation_steps: Identify high-change files in src/api/routes and src/chat.
Create MIGRATION_PLAN.md with prioritized list and migration steps.
Add TypeScript config if not present.
Commit plan and checklist for incremental migration.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Add new Jest tests to cover MCP endpoints and provider health checks, focusing on integration and basic security validation.
implementation_steps: Review existing test coverage for MCP endpoints.
Write new integration tests for endpoint responses, error handling, and health checks.
Add basic security tests (e.g., auth required, input validation).
Run tests and ensure all pass.

actionable_tasks.title: Containerize Node Backend and React Frontend with Dockerfiles
actionable_tasks.description: Write simple Dockerfiles for the Node backend and React frontend, and add a docker-compose.yml for local development.
implementation_steps: Create Dockerfile.backend for Node backend (install deps, copy code, set CMD).
Create Dockerfile.frontend for React frontend (build static files, serve with nginx or similar).
Write docker-compose.yml to orchestrate both services.
Test local build and startup.
